renderpass.code:
// 247 chars - saidwho12
#define L(x,y) length(texelFetch(iChannel0,ivec2(U+vec2(x,y)),0))
#define M(a,b) dot(vec3(L(a.x,b.x),L(a.y,b.y),L(a.z,b.z)),A)
#define mainImage(O,u)\
    vec2 U=u;\
    vec3 A=vec3(1,2,1),B=vec3(-1,0,1),C=vec3(1);\
    O+=length(vec2(M(-C,B)-M(C,B),M(B,-C)-M(B,C)))

/*
// 286 chars - saidwho12
#define L(x,y) length(texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(U+vec2(x, y)), 0))
#define D dot(vec3(L(
#define M(a,b)   D -a.x, b.x), L(-a.y, b.y), L(-a.z, b.z)), A)\
			   + D a.x, -b.x), L(a.y, -b.y), L(a.z, -b.z)), -A)

#define mainImage(O,u)\
	vec2 U = u;\
	vec3 A = vec3(1, 2, 1), B = vec3(-1, 0, 1);\
	O += length(vec2(M(B.zzz, B),M(-B, B.zzz)))
*/
/*
// 325 chars - GregRostami        
#define S(v) v[0]+v[1]+v[2]
#define L(x,y) sqrt( S(pow (texture(iChannel0, (U+vec2(x,y))/iResolution.xy)*vec4(.3, .6, .1,0),vec4(2))) )
#define D dot(vec3(L(

#define mainImage(O,u)       \
    vec2 U=u;                \
    vec3 a = vec3(1, 2, 1);  \
    O += length(vec2(D -1,-1), L(-1,0), L(-1,1)), a) + D 1,-1), L(1,0), L(1,1)), -a) ,  \
                     D -1,-1), L(0,-1), L(1,-1)), a) + D -1,1), L(0,1), L(1,1)), -a)  ))
*/

/*
// 379 chars - saidwho12
#define sqr(n) (n*n)
#define L(x, y) sqrt(dot(sqr(texture(iChannel0, (U+vec2(x,y))/iResolution.xy).xyz), vec3(.299, .587, .114)))
void mainImage( out vec4 O, in vec2 U ) {
    vec3 a = vec3(-1, -2, -1), b = vec3(1, 2, 1);
    float 	x = dot(vec3(L(-1,-1), L(-1,0), L(-1,1)), a)
        		+dot(vec3(L(1,-1), L(1,0), L(1,1)), b),
        
     		y = dot(vec3(L(-1,-1), L(0,-1), L(1,-1)), a)
        		+dot(vec3(L(-1,1), L(0,1), L(1,1)), b);
    
    O.xyz = vec3(sqrt(x*x+y*y));
}
*/
renderpass.name: Image
